title: Former U.K. ambassador to U.S. arrested amid Epstein revelations
summary_full: British police arrested Peter Mandelson on suspicion of misconduct in office, just days after the detention of former prince Andrew.
summary_public: British police arrested Peter Mandelson on suspicion of misconduct in office, just days after the detention of former prince Andrew.
